i_godan.english: to take out, to get out
to erase, to turn off power
to hear; to listen; to ask
to stretch out hands, to raise an umbrella
to take a photo or record a film

i_ichidan.english: to go out, to leave, to depart
to put in, to let in
to hang up; to make (a call)
to line up, to set up
to get up, to wake up
to tie; to fasten; to tighten

i_suru.english: to chill out, stay at home and do nothing
to be late for an appointment
